scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy:window: rimraf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && fsutil file createnew out/.nojekyll 0 && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
